abstract: Citigroup’s direct involvement in shaping a House bill suggests it feels that it should work behind the scenes to shape legislation for its benefit. Fears about its bottom line may have been what stirred it.
snippet: Citigroup’s direct involvement in shaping a House bill suggests it feels that it should work behind the scenes to shape legislation for its benefit. Fears about its bottom line may have been what stirred it.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street’s true ambitions are often revealed in mind-numbing minutiae.

headline.main: Why Did Citigroup Try to Overturn an Overhaul?

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
